title: [Dynamic Regions] tikv panic with error “sealed seqno has been flushed lock 469114 11526377 <= 11526405\"] [backtrace=\"   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}”
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
./tikv-server -V
 TiKV 
Release Version:   7.4.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   640143a2daba90bfcc9a3848d19887a7a2f39170
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v7.4.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2023-09-04 11:47:37
Rust Version:      rustc 1.67.0-nightly (96ddd32c4 2022-11-14)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release
2023-09-06T08:10:37.644+0800

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8c/32g

### Steps to reproduce
1、start pitr
2、run tpcc
go-tpc tpcc run -D tpcc20000 --host tc-tidb.endless-ha-test-oltp-pitr-multi-rocks-tps-2221276-1-188 -P4000 --warehouses 20000 -T 32 --ignore-error '2013,1213,1105,1205,8022,8028,9004,9007,1062' --user root --password '' --interval '10s'

### What did you expect?
no panic

### What did happened?
tikv panic
{"level":"FATAL","log":"[[lib.rs:510](http://lib.rs:510/)] [\"sealed seqno has been flushed lock 469114 11526377 <= 11526405\"] [backtrace=\"   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}\\n
